name: Pepe The Frog
description:
Pepe The Frog

Pepe is a frog that needs to feed but also needs your help to get it without the birds eating it to the first.
Help Pepe in these first three levels to feed and escape the birds.

Multiple levels with diferents enemys and day/light time lapse

Simple game system, collect flies and pass the next round.

¿Did you dare?
